trends: There have been no other sightings in Virgilina
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSusann and a friend were driving back from getting a large roll of hay for herhorses. They were driving south on red bank road twards virgilina VA and sawmoving north towards them a silver disk shaped object. It was approx. 5,000 fthigh, they at first thought it may be a jet, but there was no contrails, it wasa clear blue sky day. They saw it moving north for about three seconds then itvanished3B it appeared to be moving faster than a jet. They said if the sun would nothave shined off of it they would not have seen it. this report completed by tomginther, VA MUFON
